patthana22.9:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.9:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
